scripts.build: mkdir -p build build/css build/img build/js && cp index.html build && cp css/style.css node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css build/css/ && cp node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather-sprite.svg build/img && cp .secrets.js build/js/api-keys.js && webpack js/main.js --mode development -o ./build/js/bundle.js
scripts.deploy: mkdir -p deploy deploy/css deploy/img deploy/js && cp index.html deploy && cp css/style.css node_modules/bulma/css/bulma.min.css node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css deploy/css/ && cp node_modules/feather-icons/dist/feather-sprite.svg deploy/img && cp .secrets-production.js deploy/js/api-keys.js && webpack js/main.js --mode production -o ./deploy/js/bundle.js && (cd deploy && rsync -v -r . flopp@grus.uberspace.de:html/map2/)
